mapper.select:
select vr.id, vr.name, vr.phone, vr.purpose_visit, vr.visit_time, vr.status, vr.create_date, vr.user_id, vr.remark, oi.images from visit_record vr left join owner_info oi on (oi.id = vr.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND vr.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{visitRecord.name},'%')
AND vr.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{visitRecord.phone},'%')
AND vr.user_id = #{visitRecord.userId}
order by vr.create_date desc
